attributes.action: Launch National Enquiry into the Rape Gang Scandal.
attributes.additional_details: The nation has been shamed and those responsible need to be held accountable and shown to the public.
attributes.background: Launch national open deep searching investigation into the Rape Scandalz

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
